titleInfo.title: Report of the Board of Swamp Land Commissioners, and state engineer : under joint resolution no. 105, approved March 16th, 1858

name.namePart: Louisiana. Board of Swamp Land Commissioners.

mods.note: January 1859; Report is addressed to the Senate and House of Representatives of Louisiana. Concerns inquiry into the possible merging of the states Internal Improvement Department with the Board of Swamp Land Commissioners, and what would be done with slaves and equipment owned by the state under the control of the state engineer at the time; Also found in: Documents of the second session of the Fourth Legislature of the state of Louisiana (Baton Rouge : J. M. Taylor, 1859); Copy in librarys Documents of the ... Legislature is in LLMVC J87 .L8 1858p.

titleInfo.title: LSU Libraries Louisiana Waterways Management Collection
